ProcessTemplates.Name: HubSpot to JSON - Companies
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template retrieves company data from HubSpot and downloads it to a local fileshare as a single JSON file.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"HubSpotApiKey":{"Value":"\"ExampleApiKey\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The API key for accessing the HubSpot API."},"TargetFilePath":{"Value":"\"/example_directory/example_filename.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full path of the resulting JSON file, including the file name."},"CompanyProperties":{"Value":"\"domain,name,address,city,state,zip,country,phone\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The company attributes fetched with the HubSpot API request."},"CompanyAssociations":{"Value":"\"contacts,deals\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The companies' connections to other object types fetched with the HubSpot API request."}}
